subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia 76ers re-signed forward Andre Iguodala on Sunday, to a six-year contract worth a reported $80 million. Iguodala, who was a restricted free agent, helped the 76ers reach the playoffs last season for the first time in three years. An official announcement is expected Monday.
